All Implemented Interfaces:
SolutionHandler<SimpleInstallationResult>
public class WidgetClassHandler
extends AbstractPropertyRegisteringHandler

add providers classes via the API input is a file config/widgets.prop in the extensions dir providers are added via the API and are thus merged with the original widgets.prop Implementation note:

Ignores widget.prop lines with legacy notation (classname=true|false) and prints a warning to the installation log if such line was encountered.

Author:
aeb
